climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: 【Easy Cleaning & Machine Washable】Just vacuum or shake this washable area rug to keep fresh, Machine washable rug on a delicate cycle, air dry to protect and extend the life of your boho braided rugs, no dryer no bleach

【Soft & Durable】The KOZYFLY boho kitchen rugs are crafted with premium cotton material, hand-woven, well constructed, and with soft and comfortable texture, providing your feet and toes with warmth and comfort. This 4x6 outdoor rug is fade-resistant and durable and is an ideal option for high-traffic rooms with pets and kids.

【Low Pile】The boho indoor outdoor rugs feature a low pile thickness of 0.23 inches and offer ideal functionality that is perfect for busy areas, underneath furniture, and in entryways as it will not obstruct doorways.

【Stable Non-Slip Backing】This non slip area rugs for bedroom is designed with a highly effective non-slip rubber backing, ensuring exceptional traction on wooden and tile floors, even in high-traffic areas. The superior grip of this jute runner eliminates the need for rug pads, setting it apart from other reversible rugs.

【Versatile Boho Rugs】 This Boho washable area rug has a beautiful bohon pattern, not printed. It is not a solid jute color but has a chic geometric pattern with a classic braided texture that'll bring a touch of farmhouse decor to your home. Get ready to elevate your hallway, Kitchen, bathroom, front door, laundry room, bedroom and living room with this boho beauty!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: KOZYFLY Natural Boho Rugs This KOZYFLY boho rug is hand woven and braided with farmhouse natural color, made from cotton material, combined with the rubber backing, and it is versatile enough to be used alone, no rug pad is required. Create the home you’ve always dreamed of with our non slip and washable rugs.
Previous page Next page 1 ENTRYWAY/BATHROOM 2 HALLWAY/KITCHEN 3 LIVING ROOM/BEDROOM

Previous page Next page Crease Removal Before Use: Steam iron with low heat or iron over a damp towel for stubborn folds. Cotton Shrinkage: Expect slight shrinkage after washing. Wash cold and air dry to limit this effect.

Farmhouse Natural Color Looking for a simple way make your space feel polished? This farmhouse jute rug will be the finishing piece you’ve been looking for. Features with natural/brown color, this rug creates a farmhouse boho style, offering both functional and decorative for your home. Non Slip Rubber Backing This boho rug stays in play securely thanks to the non-slip rubber backing, providing safe protection for your family and pets. Anti-Slip Tip: For more safety in busy areas, consider an extra rug pad for enhanced grip.

Jute Boho Non Slip Rugs Rugs are packaged folded and may arrive with temporary creases. Here are a few pointers for unpacking your rug. 1. Please unfold your rug as soon as possible after it arrives. 2. Gently run your hands across the folds and lay the rug down as usual. Place it under your furniture and walk around. Get comfortable. 3. Refer to the washable rug care instructions on the reverse side of this insert, and vacuum and launder as advised. No worries! The creases will relax in a week or so. We can’t wait for you to start enjoying your new rug!

Versatile Boho Rugs for Every Space, in Every Size. Bathroom/Entryway 2'x3'/2x4.3' Bedroom/Hallway/Kitchen 2'x5'/2'x6'/2'x7'/2'x8'/2.6'x8'/2.6'x10'/2.6'x12' Hallway/Kitchen/Entryway 2'x5'/2'x6'/2'x7'/2'x8'/2.6'x8'/2.6'x10'/2.6'x12' Living Room/Bedroom 3'x5'/4'x6'/5'x7'/6'x9'

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy care and looks nice !
reviews.reviewText: Love this rug, everything about it. Easy to wipe, water proof, lightweight, and durable for my dogs. Using it in my bathroom and it looks great and it covers the size I needed. Thank you Debbie

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nicely made, good value, improved quality of life for disabled dog
reviews.reviewText: Bought to make easier path thru the house for a dog with mobility problems . Mats stay in place,neutral color looks nice in my Lr Dr area casual but not too utilitarian , and serve the purpose very well. Thicker more sturdy than expected. Indoor outdoor so I will probably order more for deck and porch. they have a rubber like backing but do not stick to the floor as well as some tufted kitchen rugs I have used. Would not use them if anyone in the house was at risk from tripping hazards. Have not washed yet, but they look like they can withstand a gentle cycle machine wash. I would expect to air dry. Overall good VA!be and improved quality of life for Bolt the wobbly corgi.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars your cats won't destroy this rug
reviews.reviewText: i really like the look of jute rugs but i have cats and they love sharpening their murder mittens on jute and sisal rugs (understandably so) and they end up only lasting me a few months before i have to throw out. this is a faux jute rug and it is so cat-friendly (i.e. durable) but still very nice looking! i put it in front of my laundry closet so a very high traffic area and, for the most part, it has stayed in place (except for the moments where the cats get their zoomies). i like that it is washable and that it has a rubber backing so it's not slipping and sliding everywhere. great buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars What a lovely rug!
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a runner for the kitchen. Something durable and easy to clean given it’s the kitchen. I laid this down and love it! Although it’s jute, it’s so nice on the feet and great for a crawling toddler. It’s doesn’t move around my hard wood floors and it’s not extremely thick which I love! Really happy with this quality of rug

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It was less than a 24 hour delivery, great color and pattern , soft on bare feet and width and length were very generous for price! Bonus : it has a no slip pad attached to rug.It checked all my boxes !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Love these rugs… however
reviews.reviewText: We purchased one of these rugs for our guest bathroom and a smaller size. It looks great. Absolutely love it.Because we have three huskies, we found that these rugs actually hold up very well and swapped out all of our other rugs for these. Plus they’re easy to wash and keep clean.My only issue with this particular rug and this particular size is that it’s about an inch short on each side so it looked absolutely stupid. Luckily we were able to position it in a way where you won’t really notice it however, for the $80 price tag being 2 inches short overall is ridiculous.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lays really well & no sliding
reviews.reviewText: We updated our bathroom cabinets & countertops, & this rug went perfect with the changes.We've only had it a week and its laying flat, with absolutely no sliding.I tried a few other rugs and they wanted shift. This is very flat, lays natural, and serves its purpose, so much I purchased 2 more, smaller ones to add near the shower & tub.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great rug for high traffic but NOT non-slip
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. The rug has a nice color pattern and great for high traffic. It claims to be non-slip but it definitely does slid a bit on tile and hardwood. I purchased rug slickers for the bottom to fix it from moving. Good rug for the price but save yourself and purchase the rug stickers.
Me encanto ! Medidas perfectas. El material mejor de lo esperado.

This rug is floppy and flimsy. The no-stick bottom isn’t sticky and it will shift around a lot as you walk on it. I’ve had it for 2 months and there’s still a wrinkle in the middle. I added a piece of no-stick mesh from that Swedish company; the rug and mat still shift, even when I sweep away all the dirt and dust from under it. I’m tired of looking and it’s a perfect colour, so I’m keeping it and I will try a thicker, stickier mesh.

En el pasillo de mi cocina eran muy visibles las pequeñas gotas de agua que caían del uso del fregadero, asunto resuelto con este tapete, muy disimulador y fácil de lavar o simplemente sacudir. Las marcas del doblez desaperecen en unos pocos días
Precioso y de muy buena calidad!
